actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The scheznyki magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment it wears or carries is invisible with it.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The scheznyki casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: dancing lights, faerie fire
3/day each: locate object, hideous laughter, ray of enfeeblement
1/day each: dispel magic, hold person

special_abilities.name: Beard Weakness
special_abilities.desc: A creature grappling the scheznyki can take its action to cut off the scheznyki's beard by succeeding on a DC 15 Strength check while holding an edged weapon. If its beard is cut off, the scheznyki can't use Spellcasting until its beard regrows.

special_abilities.name: Brute
special_abilities.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the scheznyki hits with it (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The scheznyki has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
